mapper.sql: OID, MBD_OID, ACTION, RELEASED_BY, RELEASE_TIME, OPINION
mapper.insert:
SELECT TBL_MBD_HISTORY_Seq.nextval AS OID FROM DUAL
insert into TBL_MBD_HISTORY
OID,
MBD_OID,
ACTION,
RELEASED_BY,
RELEASE_TIME,
OPINION,
#{oid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{mbdOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{action,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{releasedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{opinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update TBL_MBD_HISTORY
MBD_OID = #{mbdOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACTION = #{action,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RELEASED_BY = #{releasedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RELEASE_TIME = #{releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OPINION = #{opinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where OID = #{oid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update TBL_MBD_HISTORY set MBD_OID = #{mbdOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACTION = #{action,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RELEASED_BY = #{releasedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RELEASE_TIME = #{releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPINION = #{opinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where OID = #{oid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ah.OID, ah.MBD_OID, ah.ACTION, ah.RELEASED_BY, ah.RELEASE_TIME, ah.OPINION, u.USER_FULL_NAME as RELEASED_BY_NAME from TBL_MBD_HISTORY ah left join TBL_USER u on u.USER_ID = ah.RELEASED_BY where ah.MBD_OID = #{mbdOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} order by ah.RELEASE_TIME desc
